function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of digitized information for pandemic response","Impact":"Misinformation and dissemination of inaccurate data","Mitigation":"Implement fact-checking processes and verification mechanisms for digitized information","Technologies":"Data analytics, artificial intelligence, machine learning","People":"Public administration, population","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Use of drones for mobility and surveillance actions","Impact":"Privacy concerns and data security risks","Mitigation":"Adopt strict privacy policies, encryption, and access control measures for drone data","Technologies":"Drone technology, encryption, access control systems","People":"Urban residents, public security agencies","Owner":"City governments, public security agencies"}]}
